item.description:
I have 19 Not easily Broken - Advance Movie Screening passes and these babies are like golden tickets to give you access upstairs. I will get there early at 5:20pm and all of us can start moving up the escalator as a group at 6pm. Lines start moving in at 6:30pm 100% positive by experience. The first 2 Boston Movie Members that comes early can go and start a line for us. I just got the tix yesterday and should of posted this yeterday but I was very tired from work. This gives you about 30+ hours to think if you want to come RSVP or not.

http://www.sonypictur...


If you cannot find me. Just call me at 617-435-8177 I will or we will be standing in the main lobby near the escalator. I will be wearing a blue cap that has the initials JP in (red) which stands for Jamaica Plain.


Windsor
item.how_to_find_us: Well I'll be wearing a blue cap that has the initials JP in (red)
item.name: NOT EASILY BROKEN - Advance Movie Screening
